column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Drinks are very delicious and creative. Highly recommend trying the Southsider if you are a gin lover. BC lemonade is refreshing. Appetizers are very good
column2: especially the flatbread and pork candy. The brick chicken is tender inside with crispy finishes. The staff are very friendly and the decor is unique. It's a cool spot for happy hours and lively dinners with friends.
